course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Distributed Generation (DG): Principles, Applications and Prospects in Hong Kong
course.description: This course reviews several promising Distributed Generation (DG) technologies and equips and motivates a multi-dimensional perspective to study their prospects in Hong Kong. Careful attention would be paid to the technologies, stakeholders, resources, pollution, policy and financing aspects of DG. Interdisciplinary teams will deliver a comprehensive analysis of a chosen renewable DG technology in Hong Kong's contexts. Instructor consent is required.
